object.description: Distribution of condsumary word values

object.name: CondArrTKRTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival TKR triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for TKR triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for TKR triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival Cal-Low triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for Cal-Low triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for Cal-Low triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCalHiTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival Cal-Hi triggers

object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for Cal-Hi triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCNOTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival CNO triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for CNO triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for CNO triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrROITrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival ROI triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for ROI triggers (nomially 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for ROI triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: DiscardedDelta_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM discarded events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM discarded events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: DeadZoneDelta_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM deadzone events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM deadzone events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: Acd_GemVeto_AcdTile_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd Gem vetos by tile. Expect to see spikes at 15,31,47,63. These are the large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.
object.description: Number of Acd Gem vetos by tile. Expect to see spikes at 15,31,47,63. These are the large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.

object.name: AcdGemROI_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd ROI by tower. This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.
object.description: Number of Acd ROI by tower. This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.

object.name: AcdGemCNO_GARC_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd CNO by board. This bit is the OR of all the CNO signals on a single board. Because of the tile to board mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal.
object.description: Number of Acd Cno by board. This bit is the OR of all the CNO signals on a single board. Because of the tile to board mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal.

object.name: AcdDigis_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of ACD Digis per event
object.description: Distribution of ACD digis per event. This is just the total number of tiles that have at least one PMT above the zero suppression threshold.

object.name: AcdDigis_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of ACD Digis per event
object.description: Distribution of ACD digis per event. This is just the total number of tiles that have at least one PMT above the zero suppression threshold.

object.name: TkrHits_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of strip hits per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of the number of strip hits per event (all towers included).

object.name: TkrHits_TH1_Tower[16]
object.description: Distribution of the number of strip hits per tower.

object.name: TkrPlanesHit_TH1_Tower[16]
object.description: Distribution of the number of planes hit in a tower.

object.name: TkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of strip hits vs Tower and Tkr plane.
object.description: Number of strip hits vs Tower and Tkr plane.

object.name: ZeroTkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Counter for ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane.
object.description: Counter for ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane.

object.name: HitsInEmptyTower_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of hits when the tower was empty vs tower number
object.description: Number of hits when the tower was empty vs tower number

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of TkrDigi objects in each vs Tower and Tracker plane.
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects in each vs Tower and Tracker plane.

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of TkrDigi objects vs tower number
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects vs tower number.

object.name: TkrDigis_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of tracker Digis per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of the number of TkrDigis per event (all towers included).

object.name: ToT_0_WhenTkrHitsExist_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: ZeroCalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalX_NHit_Tower_TH1[16]
object.axisdesc: [Number of CalX_Hits in this tower, N]
object.description: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event in this tower.

object.name: CalX_Total_NHit_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included).

object.name: CalXReadoutRange_TH2
object.titledesc: Cal readout range used vs cal channel. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Cal readout range used vs cal channel. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
